attributes.action: Never allow such a undemocratic process to happen again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A person not even voted for by his or hers party should never have the opportunity to become leader of that party and certainly not PM without some kind of vote at least by their own political party.

Further more they should not ever use the "lords" loop hole to bring other unelected people into parliament.

....And they certainly should not be allowed to wait 3 years before going to the people for a general election, its a front to democracy and completely undemocratic and should never happen again in the UK a suppose-id democracy.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
